changes.title: Controller support
changes.description: Added support for controllers to enhance gameplay experience.

changes.title: Localization
changes.description: Expanded language support to include Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese, German, and Bahasa Indonesia.

changes.title: Taken upgrade database from pause menu
changes.description: New upgrade database menu functionality to the pause menu for easier access.

changes.title: Add Stage 2
changes.description: Introduced Stage 2, featuring 4 new Monsters, 4 new Minibosses, and 1 new Boss.

changes.title: Change coin to soul point
changes.description: Converted in-game currency from coins to soul points.

changes.title: Remove impossible achievement, add new achievement related to stage 2
changes.description: Removed unattainable achievements and added new achievements related to Stage 2 content.

changes.title: Fix Tutorial
changes.description: Rectified issues with the tutorial to ensure smoother player experience.

changes.title: Reduce Boss collision damage
changes.description: Decreased collision damage inflicted by Bosses from 20 to 5 to balance gameplay.

changes.title: Merge Reroll on special upgrade to Opportunist
changes.description: Consolidation of Reroll feature into Opportunist.

changes.title: Fix Jet Propulsion
changes.description: Rectification of issues with Jet Propulsion ability.

changes.title: New special upgrade Vacuum Dodge
changes.description: Introduction of Vacuum Dodge as a new special upgrade.

changes.title: Buff majority of special upgrades value
changes.description: Increase in value for the majority of special upgrades.

changes.title: Fix reward bug
changes.description: Resolution of bugs affecting rewards.

changes.title: Change score system (now killing enemy reward you with score)
changes.description: Modification to the scoring system to reward points for defeating enemies.

changes.title: Fix character lock
changes.description: Correction of character locking issues.

changes.title: UI revamp
changes.description: Revamping of user interface for improved aesthetics and usability.

changes.title: Revamp Weapon Evo adding mini ability
changes.description: Overhaul of Weapon Evolution system with addition of mini abilities.

changes.title: Fix lag issue
changes.description: Resolution of performance lag issue.

changes.title: Change Knockback System
changes.description: Alteration to the knockback system for improved gameplay.

changes.title: Fix Bug on several upgrades
changes.description: Rectification of bugs affecting multiple upgrades.

changes.title: Fix unintended upgrades interaction
changes.description: Correction of unintended interactions between upgrades.

changes.title: Indicator for RPG Buff Upgrade and Miner Crystal
changes.description: Inclusion of indicators for RPG Buff Upgrades and Miner Crystals.

changes.title: Archer and Miner ability base damage buff
changes.description: Increase in base damage for Archer and Miner abilities.

changes.title: Add Special Enemy
changes.description: Introduction of a new special enemy type.

changes.title: Buff few upgrades adding base damage
changes.description: Enhancement to select upgrades by adding base damage.

changes.title: Update Status Panel
changes.description: Enhancement to the status panel for better user experience.

changes.title: Miner (Testing)
changes.description: Introduction of a new character, currently in testing phase.

changes.title: Fix Setting Menu
changes.description: Rectification of issues in the settings menu.

changes.title: Buff Enemy Reward
changes.description: Increase in rewards obtained from defeating enemies.

changes.title: Buff Weapon Evo Chance
changes.description: Enhancement to the chances of weapon evolution.

changes.title: Buff Knight Stamina Regeneration
changes.description: Improvement in stamina regeneration rate for Knights.

changes.title: Buff Soldier Base Damage
changes.description: Increase in base damage for Soldiers.

changes.title: Add Legendary Chest
changes.description: Inclusion of a legendary chest feature with exclusive rewards.

changes.title: Add Discord Rich Presence
changes.description: Integration of Discord Rich Presence feature.

changes.title: Miner
changes.description: New characters for the upcoming new stages.

changes.title: New Special Upgrade
changes.description: We added 30+ new special upgrades, and also adjusted old special upgrades.

changes.title: New Weapon Evo System
changes.description: we added a new system where each character's weapon can evolve and make the character stronger with new abilities.

changes.title: New Rarity and Legendary Chest
changes.description: There is now a new upgrade with a mythic level, and it is only obtained from the legendary chest with a small chance of miniboss and boss.

changes.title: Update Notes Menu
changes.description: You can now view our game changes and updates from this menu, and will be notified when a new version is available.

changes.title: Shop Refund System
changes.description: You can now refund the gold you have spent on the shop.

changes.title: Leaderboard Error
changes.description:
We've fixed an error posting highscore data to the leaderboard that caused the abilities from the previous game that were retrieved to be listed when you pressed play again.
And we've also fixed the leaderboard reload button, which becomes disabled when you return to the main menu after playing.

changes.title: Saving Data
changes.description: We have improved the game's saving system, which should prevent certain data from being deleted when players upgrade the game to a new version.

changes.title: Leaderboard
changes.description:
In this version, we try to implement a Leaderboard system.
With the leaderboard, everyone can look at what the others are building to achieve a high score.

changes.title: Nickname System
changes.description:
The nickname is used for the highscore leaderboard.
Maybe in the future it will be based on the username from Steam.

changes.title: Protobarrier Bug
changes.description: Fixed the issue of the knight's abilities not being able to turn on again when taking unique abilities that reduce max hp capacity.
